name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape Quiz | S | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of John's client whom he keeps blowing off, mostly to sneak out and sleep with Cynthia?
questions.explanation:
Kirkland.

	At the end of the film, John is told that Kirkland has decided to take his business elsewhere.

questions.text: Graham haggles his landlord-to-be down to a monthly rent that he can afford. To what price do they agree?
questions.explanation:
$400 per month.

	The lease is on a month-to-month basis.

questions.text: When Graham arrives at Ann and John's house, he bears a gift for the couple. What is it?
questions.explanation:
strawberries.

	He hands Ann the strawberries and makes a beeline for the bathroom.

questions.text: John tells Graham that Ann always adds too much of something to the dishes she cooks. What is it?
questions.explanation:
salt.

	John goes on to say, 'You can always add more...but you can't take it away.' Very telling, that.

questions.text: A drunken regular in the bar where Cynthia works quotes a movie in the scene when Ann first comes to visit her sister. What is the movie?
questions.explanation:
Apocalypse Now.

	And it's a pretty lousy Brando impression, at that.

questions.text: Ann buys a present for her and Cynthia's mother's 50th birthday. What is it?
questions.explanation:
a sun dress.

	Cynthia thinks it looks like a tablecloth.

questions.text: Cynthia has agreed to pay for half of her mother's birthday present. What does Ann tell her that her share comes to?
questions.explanation:
$32.50

	Cynthia is put out by this amount, but eventually agrees to kick in her share.

questions.text: Ann is the first person to learn the truth about Graham's particular fetish. What is the name of the woman who appears on the first tape she notices in Graham's apartment?
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Graham says, at first, only that Donna was a woman he knew in Florida.

questions.text: How does Ann discover that her sister is sleeping with her husband?
questions.correct: Ann finds her sister's earring in her bedroom
options: Graham tells Ann about the affair
John slips up while lying about his whereabouts
questions.explanation:
Ann finds her sister's earring in her bedroom.

	Ann's immediate reaction is to slough off her husband's pajamas as though they are on fire.

questions.text: Graham is asked several times whether he plans to resume contact with his old girlfriend, who still lives in town. What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Elizabeth.

	We never do get to see Elizabeth. Near the end of the film, John confesses to having slept with her years ago while she and Graham were still together. Apparently he's been a jerk since the word 'go.'
